column4: can anyone help me i am not able to update and upgrade my system and i am not able to open any web sites , but i am able to use xchat and pingin
<predaeus> then tell me what to do
<predaeus> but i dont have any firewall software in my system can you tell me what to do or how to check
nah I meant, did you change anything or did you just install fresh?
sounds like you are behind a firewall that blocks http.
did you do a fresh install?
ya i know but i have to keep this system
did you install Ubuntu yesterday and it is not working, or did you use it for some time and it suddenly doesn't work anymore?
ya i have install in 2 week ago
i used it for some time
I am not sure but maybe there is a proxy setting in gnome that might cause that. Did you configure a proxy?
i think the problem came from a site . I used one site to download more then 1 file from rapid share
sounds very unlikely, the browser should not be able to change system wide proxy settings. But if you are using firefox check Edit/Preferences/Advanced/Network to see if a proxy is enabled.
Then check Edit/Preferences/Advanced/Network to see if a proxy is enabled. Also run "gnome-network-preferences" and check if a gnome wide network proxy is enabled.
it should be set on direct connection and not using a proxy.
if both programs are not using a proxy, then I don't know. Might be a different problem or a different setting or maybe your ISP.
